about_the_game:
Lost Forest is a action ride for Epic Roller Coasters.
This roller coaster takes the player to a forest/swamp full of magical creatures. A place where danger can hide behind every corner.
Attached to a boat cart the player will witness the life from other worlds.

Hold tight to your seat belt and enjoy it.
detailed_description:
Lost Forest is a action ride for Epic Roller Coasters.
This roller coaster takes the player to a forest/swamp full of magical creatures. A place where danger can hide behind every corner.
Attached to a boat cart the player will witness the life from other worlds.

Hold tight to your seat belt and enjoy it.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1 (64bit) or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i5- 4590 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit) or higher
  • Processor: Intel i5- 4590 equivalent or greater.
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 AMD Radeon RX 480 (equivalent or better)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
